name: The Urban Trekker
description:
Please note. Every single pattern in this photo was made, cut, engineered, sewn, nailed, stretched and fabricated by hand over a wooden last.

No machines, just pure artisan craftsmanship mixed with some post colonial African aesthetic. This pair of footwear is not just a fancy item of clothing. 

The Urban Trekker combines innovative elements of a dress shoe, vulcanized sneaker and work boot to create the Ultra Modern Urban Trekker. Infused with a comfortable Vibram sole, Good year welt and Heel counter.

name: The Sub Saharan
description:
Please note. Every single pattern in this photo was made, cut, engineered, sewn, nailed, stretched and fabricated by hand over a wooden last. 

No machines, just pure artisan craftsmanship mixed with some post colonial African aesthetic. This pair of footwear is not just a fancy item of clothing. 

The Sub Saharan combines innovative elements of a running shoe, desert sandal and track trainer to create the high performance Sub Saharan. Infused with a breathable wax cotton upper, cork mid sole and foam rubber out sole.
